ARABIC: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ٱبْيَضَّتْ وُجُوهُهُمْ فَفِى رَحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ هُمْ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for those whose faces are whitened, they are in Allah's mercy, remaining in it timelessly, for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those with bright faces shall be under God's grace and enjoy it for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And those whose faces have turned bright, they will be in the mercy of Allah, and therein they shall abide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The people whose faces have become white will enjoy the mercy of God with which they will live forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those whose faces will be shining, are in the mercy of Allah; they will abide in it forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And for those whose faces will become white, they will be in Allah's mercy (Paradise), therein they shall dwell forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And as to those whose faces turn white, they shall be in Allah's mercy; in it they shall-abide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But as for those whose faces are whitened, they shall be in God's mercy, therein dwelling forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And as for those whose faces have been whitened, in the mercy of Allah they dwell for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But as for those with shining faces, they shall abide forever in God's grace.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And as for those whose faces shall have become whitened-- they shall be in Allah's mercy; therein they shall be abiders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But as for those whose faces become white, they shall dwell in Allah’s mercy, and they will remain in it [forever].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But those whose faces will be (lit with) white,- they will be in (the light of) Allah's mercy: therein to dwell (for ever).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And for those whose faces will become white, they will be in Allah's Mercy (Paradise), therein they shall dwell forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As for those whose faces will be whitened, they shall be in the Mercy of Allah for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But as for those whose faces are whitened: they are in God’s mercy, remaining in it forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But as for those whose faces will turn white, [they will be] within the mercy of Allah. They will abide therein eternally.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:107] But as for those whose faces are whitened, and these are the believers, they shall be in God’s mercy, that is to say, in Paradise, abiding therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (As for those whose faces have been whitened, Lo! in the mercy of Allah) in Allah's Paradise (they dwell for ever) never to die or leave it.
